item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106.2)
item.description:
What's New

Fix Free Mark feature to correctly enforce immediate mark placement

When Free Mark is OFF, marks/modifiers must be typed immediately after the vowel:

  1. Tone marks (s/f/r/x/j for Telex, 1-5 for VNI):

- Only allow if last char is a vowel

- Example: 'a+s+n+h' → 'ánh' ✓, 'a+n+h+s' → 'anhs' ✗

  1. Vowel modifiers (aa→â, oo→ô, ee→ê, w→ư/ơ/ă):

- Only allow if last char matches the expected vowel

- Additional check for 'w': reject if there are unmodified vowels before lastChar

- Example: 'u+a+w' → 'uaw' ✗, 'u+w+o+w' → 'ươ' ✓

  1. D modifier (dd→đ for Telex, d+9 for VNI):

- Only allow if last char is 'd'

- Example: 'd+d+i' → 'đi' ✓, 'd+i+d' → 'did' ✗

The fix correctly handles already-modified vowels (with TONEWMASK or TONEMASK)

so that sequential modifications like 'ư+o+w' → 'ươ' still work.
